editorialNotes.standard: Years ago, Plants vs. Zombies defined a genre with its fresh concept, undeniable charm and innovative, balanced gameplay. Now the undead have risen again, bringing with them new time-travelling tales and a massive slew of new zombies and plants. Whether you stomp foes without spending any money or you buy new experimental plants and power-ups with In-App Purchases, the result is the same: an incredible sequel that's fresh and fun throughout, reminding us why we fell in love with this world in the first place.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: Choose a Pokémon and team up!

editorialNotes.standard: Dominate the lanes of this highly polished multiplayer online battle arena as a rocket-loving robot, a bunny-like mage or another unique hero from a list of dozens.

editorialNotes.tagline: Can you build the best base?
editorialNotes.standard: It’s hard to understate Clash of Clans’ massive influence in establishing complex strategic multiplayer on mobile – we still love logging on to find that our meticulously placed and upgraded fortifications survived another onslaught.

ios.subtitle: Cook food and dash in kitchens
Make a toast with your allies

editorialNotes.standard: Colourful chaos awaits in our 2016 iPhone Game of the Year. Supercell’s awesome card battler delivers excellent deck-building mechanics and fast-paced fights in a package that’s easy to understand and undeniably fun. Upgrading, unlocking and experimenting with cards gives the game endless replayability, and deciding just where to drop your heroes makes each battle distinct. But no matter how good your deck is, there’s no substitute for skill and quick thinking.
editorialNotes.short: Collect powerful cards and crush your competition.

ios.subtitle: Open and stack the new states

editorialNotes.short: Keep customers happy as you serve food from around the world.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: The cheerful humour of the Bikini Bottom crew keeps us smiling as we juggle orders in chaotic cooking challenges.

ios.subtitle: Clear the Lot & Solve Bus Jams

editorialNotes.standard: Carve out a new homeland by rallying Viking heroes to build cities and command armies over land and sea in this captivating strategy game.

name: Garena 傳說對決：傳說寶藏版本

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: 在游戏中体验中华兵家智慧

editorialNotes.tagline: Ride it like you built it
editorialNotes.standard: No mere port of a pre-existing classic, this is a stunning reimagining of perhaps our most beloved business-building sim. We love snagging new card packs to build bigger and better rides, and our inner Walt Disney obsesses over the perfect placement of attractions, restaurants, and, of course, restrooms—you never know when a customer is going to find one of our roller coaster creations a little too intense.
Bounce off a teammate’s feet, unleash flaming tigers – we love how wild flourishes make this 5-a-side football game even flashier.

editorialNotes.short: It's time to take your team to the top 🏎 🏁
editorialNotes.tagline: Take your team to the top
Can you build the best deck?
editorialNotes.standard: PopCap’s done it again. By taking their amazing lawn-battling recipe and changing the ingredients, they’ve created a game that’s undeniably unique. This time, we’re building decks, collecting heroes and fighting friends in head-to-head battles. As usual, the humour is plentiful and the animation is wonderful—but Heroes’ smart gameplay and clever challenges are what we just can’t get enough of.
Collect infantry, tanks, and more to dominate the front line in this unique World War II–themed card battler.
